general.seo-description: We are specialists in web development. We follow you all the way, always focused on achieving the objectives.

cover.title: The Team
cover.subtitle: With more than 10 years of experience we help you develop your online business.

team.name: Walter Mazzariol
team.description: He is our “IT Guy”, trained in Systems Engineering, he is the head of all projects that include Web Development. That “magic” that clients define as “make the menu move more and with a little color”. He is also passionate about Venezuelan music and tends to lose his Smartphones frequently.

team.name: Christian Uzcategui
team.description: Trained in Digital Communication and Advertising, he is the head of Social Media in the agency since our beginnings. About to become a contemporary adult (although he refuses to accept it) he loves motorcycles and we never know where he is although he is always “online”. Without a specific location.

team.name: Sergio Mazzariol
team.description: Sergio ... Ay, Sergio! He is our second in command in the Web Development department, with a degree in Computer Engineering, he has unique ideas and solutions. He is tough in his area and in his daily life (although sometimes none of us have it) he never misses an electronic festival where he sometimes lasts days dancing…

team.name: Natassha Rodriguez
team.description: Specialist in Social Communication, Natassha is quite a character (We suggest you to see her Instagram) She is one of our best creatives in the agency and is in charge of the main music brands in our portfolio. She is always looking for any excuse to take a coffee and be a “Social Media Hack”.

team.name: Yelitza Murillo
team.description: Trained at the Roberto Mata Academy in Caracas. Her photographic proposal does not need additional light games, because with all that she reflects, it is enough. They say that the best perfumes come in small bottles, and she is a concentrate of creativity and mischief. She is obsessed with spelling and is our “typo hunter”.

team.name: Mariangela Peluso
team.description: Mari is in charge of our Graphic Design department for Social Media, loves GIFs and specialized in Advertising Graphics in Italy in 2014. She loves her pets and is in the sweet expectation of a girl called Lucía.

team.name: Daniela Rodriguez
team.description: Creator of our main web projects, Daniela makes sure that the client is always satisfied with the final product. Since 2017 she has been in Spain, but that does not prevent her from being fully involved in the next project.

team.name: Argenis Alvarez
team.description: Trained in Graphic Design in the 90's, specialized in UX - UI, he is always the one who attends to our Millennial consultations. Always up to date and thinking “What are they going to come up with now?”

tags.cookie-message: We use our own and third-party cookies to improve your user experience.
tags.not-found-message: You are in a wrong page.. Go back to our home
